title: Follow live: Round 1 of the 2025 WNBA draft
description: How did the top picks play out? Watch this yearâ€™s draft live on ESPN.
excerpt: Get pick by pick results from each round of the 2025 WNBA Draft with Draftcast on ESPN
text: Draft News Geno Auriemma explains how to coach Paige BueckersGeno Auriemma is asked to give advice to Dallas Wings coach Chris Koclanes on how to coach No. 1 pick Paige Bueckers.Hailey Van Lith thanks family after being drafted by ChicagoNew Chicago Sky star Hailey Van Lith tells Holly Rowe how her family has impacted her work ethic.Sky select Hailey Van Lith with the 11th pickThe Chicago Sky take TCU star Hailey Van Lith with the 11th pick in the WNBA draft.Fantasy women's basketball: Analysis of key WNBA draft picks, free-agents, tradesEric Moody and Andre Snellings break down the most impactful WNBA draft picks, free-agent signings and trades and what it means for fantasy in 2025.Connecticut Sun select Aneesah Morrow 7th overallThe Connecticut Sun select Aneesah Morrow from LSU with the seventh pick of the WNBA draft.From AD to Arike: Paige Bueckers gets warm welcome to Dallas as WNBA draft's No. 1 pickThe Dallas Wings' selection of Bueckers at No. 1 sparked excitement from across the sports world.
html:
Draft News

  • Geno Auriemma explains how to coach Paige Bueckers

    Geno Auriemma is asked to give advice to Dallas Wings coach Chris Koclanes on how to coach No. 1 pick Paige Bueckers.

  • Hailey Van Lith thanks family after being drafted by Chicago

    New Chicago Sky star Hailey Van Lith tells Holly Rowe how her family has impacted her work ethic.

  • Sky select Hailey Van Lith with the 11th pick

    The Chicago Sky take TCU star Hailey Van Lith with the 11th pick in the WNBA draft.

  • Fantasy women's basketball: Analysis of key WNBA draft picks, free-agents, trades

    Eric Moody and Andre Snellings break down the most impactful WNBA draft picks, free-agent signings and trades and what it means for fantasy in 2025.

  • Connecticut Sun select Aneesah Morrow 7th overall

    The Connecticut Sun select Aneesah Morrow from LSU with the seventh pick of the WNBA draft.

  • From AD to Arike: Paige Bueckers gets warm welcome to Dallas as WNBA draft's No. 1 pick

    The Dallas Wings' selection of Bueckers at No. 1 sparked excitement from across the sports world.
